author: BBC Sport
description: Motorcycling and family were the inseparable constants in the life of Nicky Hayden, who has died aged 35.
title: Nicky Hayden: The backyard racer who conquered the world

author:
Tom Jensen                    

                                    
                        @tomjensen100
description: The NASCAR community reacts to the passing of MotoGP champion Nicky Hayden, who died Monday from injuries suffered in a bicycle accident.
title: NASCAR community reacts to passing of Nicky Hayden | FOX Sports

description: Der frühere MotoGP-Weltmeister Nicky Hayden ist tot. Er erlag in Italien seinen schweren Verletzungen nach einem Fahrradunfall, wie das Krankenhaus in Cesena mitteilte.
title: Motorsport: Nicky Hayden nach Unfall in Italien gestorben

author: Chase Wilhelm
description: Dale Earnhardt Jr. opens up about the injured Nicky Hayden and how he chose to pay tribute to him this weekend at Charlotte Motor Speedway.
title: Dale Earnhardt Jr. on Nicky Hayden: ‘He’s an incredible person’ | FOX Sports

author: BBC Sport
description: Former MotoGP champion Nicky Hayden dies aged 35, five days after being involved in a crash while cycling in Italy.
title: Nicky Hayden: Ex-MotoGP champion dies after collision

author: Tom Lutz
description: Nicky Hayden, the former MotoGP world champion, has died five days after he was involved in a bicycle accident
title: Nicky Hayden, former MotoGP world champion, dies five days after bike crash

author:

description: American motorcycle racer Nicky Hayden has died from injuries sustained in a bicycle crash.
title: Motorcycle racer Nicky Hayden dies from injuries sustained in bicycle crash | FOX Sports

author: FOCUS Online
description: Nicky Hayden hat sein schwerstes Rennen nicht gewonnen. Der US-Amerikaner fuhr erfolgreich hunderte Grands Prix auf dem Motorrad, wurde Weltmeister in der Königsklasse MotoGP - und erliegt jetzt ausgerechnet den Folgen eines Fahrrad-Unfalls. Das Hayden-Drama.
title: Trauer um MotoGP-Legende: Nicky Hayden stirbt mit 35

description: Former MotoGP champion Nicky Hayden has died five days after being hit by a car while cycling in eastern Italy, his Honda World Superbike team says.
title: Former MotoGP champion Nicky Hayden dies after cycling accident

author: Mark Critchley
description: Nicky Hayden, the World Superbike Championship rider and 2006 MotoGP world champion, has died five days after being involved in a road collision. The 35-year-old American was cycling along the Rimini coastline in Italy last Wednesday when a car collided with his bicycle. Hayden, from Owensboro, Kentucky, suffered head and chest injuries in the collision and was transferred to the Maurizio Bufalini Hospital in Cesena, where he was treated in the intensive care unit.
title: Former MotoGP world champion Nicky Hayden dies following crash
